forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight approaches Downtown San Francisco, the modern skyline glimmers under a canopy of cerulean. The afternoon has unfolded under a blanket of sunshine, the kind that dances lightly on the skin while the breeze carries whispers of the bay's salty charm. With temperatures gracefully drifting from mid-sixties down to the forties, it’s an invitation to relish in the cool embrace of early evening. The golden hue of the setting sun kisses the buildings while the distinctive outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge melt into the horizon, creating a picturesque backdrop unmarred by the typical fog that often blankets the city.

The clarity today is a gift, offering stunning views both towards the shimmering waters of the bay and the rolling hills that cradle the city alive with energy. There is no sign of the marine layer lurking on the outskirts; the air feels crisp yet gentle, perfect for an evening stroll. As the night draws closer, wrapping the city in cooler breaths, layers are advisable—perhaps a comfortable sweater over a light shirt, ready for the coolness that sneaks in with the falling stars. This evening urges one to take a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, pausing at the piers where the fresh air and festive lights beckon, or perhaps to find solace in a cozy café, savoring a warm drink as day turns to night.
